title: Contemporary Studio with Private Garden and Garage in Radziwie
description: Discover modern living in this stylish studio apartment designed with a spacious open floor plan, perfect for young professionals. The flat offers a sunny living area, a cozy designated bedroom nook, and upgraded air conditioning to keep you comfortable all year round. Enjoy the outdoors from your very own private garden, ideal for both relaxation and entertaining friends. An included spot in the secure underground garage ensures hassle-free parking and gated motion-sensor exterior lights provide additional peace of mind.
neighborhood_description: Set in the character-filled Radziwie area of Płock, this property benefits from the district’s distinct historic charm blended with community-driven vibrancy. Public transport routes and highway access offer convenient connections for daily commuting. Residents enjoy lively urban energy, local cafés, and a friendly atmosphere—perfect for urban lifestyles.
lifestyle_benefits: quick city access by transit or car
target_buyer: Ideal for a young professional or couple—especially pet owners—who want quiet private outdoor space without sacrificing city connections.
market_positioning: This property stands out in the Płock market for offering a true blend of indoor/outdoor living and coveted amenities (garden, garage) at a medium price point in a dynamic, character-rich neighborhood.
